title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 6.13 - Storage of universal samples
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 6.13 - Storage of universal samples

State Regulations
A tester shall maintain universal samples under
conditions designed to and which ensure their integrity. A tester shall
maintain the portion of each universal sample left over after testing for 24
hours, under conditions set forth in the applicable provisions of Standard

Methods. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
6.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
